subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Nick Kyrgios, a 19-year-old wild-card entrant from Australia, advanced to the quarterfinals, as did Roger Federer, who beat Tommy Robredo and will next play Stan Wawrinka.
snippet: Nick Kyrgios, a 19-year-old wild-card entrant from Australia, advanced to the quarterfinals, as did Roger Federer, who beat Tommy Robredo and will next play Stan Wawrinka.
